comments.text:
I wasn't surprised. Obesity, diabetes and high blood pressure are high and 
rising. This #1 must be because of the sugar culture, after all the sugar 
cane was the leading economic commodity for more than a hundred years. And 
as a brazilian, I don't like sweets very much. But everyone here has to put 
spoons and spoons of white sugar in their orange juices, coffees, milk and 
so on. Sometimes people are impressed that I say: I don't like sweets that 
much lol. Curiosity: Hershey's had to increase the sugar amount in their 
chocolate when they arrived in the country (for my disgust).﻿
